experiences.description: Led product development for the company's flagship SaaS platform, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement. Managed a team of 5 product owners and worked closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to deliver successful product launches. Implemented agile methodologies to improve product development efficiency.

Responsible for defining and prioritizing the product backlog for a suite of enterprise software applications. Conducted user research and market analysis to identify opportunities for product improvement and innovation. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure successful product delivery.

Assisted in the development and launch of a new consumer electronics product. Conducted market research, analyzed competitive landscape, and developed product marketing materials. Supported the product management team in all aspects of the product lifecycle.

education.description: Concentration in Strategy and Innovation. Awarded the Dean's Fellowship for academic excellence. Actively involved in the Entrepreneurship Club and the Product Management Club.
Graduated with honors. Member of the IEEE student chapter. Conducted research in the field of robotics.
